c3h8.java.util
Interface IFluentProperty<Owner,Value>

All Known Subinterfaces:
IFluentCollectionProperty<Owner,Value,Container>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FluentCollectionDelegateProperty, FluentCollectionProperty, FluentDelegateProperty, FluentProperty
public interface IFluentProperty<Owner,Value>

The aim of IFluentProperty interface is to unify FluentProperty and FluentDelegateProperty classes into one hierarchy.

Author:
Volodymyr Frolov <frolov.volodymyr@gmail.com>

Method Summary
 Owner with(Value value)
          Set a new value for a property and link owner fluently.
 

Method Detail

with

Owner with(Value value)
Set a new value for a property and link owner fluently.

Example:

 Person.firstName.with("John")
    .lastName.with("Smith");

Parameters:
value - new value for a property.
Returns:
link to property owner object.
